data.name: Andre
data.title: Fullstack Software Engineer | Cloud-Native & AI-Powered Systems
data.summary: Multidisciplinary fullstack software engineer with a unique blend of skills across AI/ML integration, DevOps, cloud-native deployments, real-time data systems, and enterprise platform extension (SAP/Salesforce). Experienced in designing and delivering scalable, intelligent SaaS solutions that combine performance, automation, and business impact.

projects.title: TransparAI
projects.purpose: An AI platform providing clear analysis of complex legal and technical documents, complete with secure authentication and subscriptions.
projects.impact: Empowered users with AI-driven summaries, risk scores, and key clause extraction, significantly improving decision-making across legal and technical domains.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer, built the UI, integrated the Gemini AI API, and implemented secure auth with Stripe subscriptions, deploying to cloud platforms.

projects.title: PlatformPro Jobs
projects.purpose: A specialized job board connecting platform engineering talent with employers, featuring AI-powered candidate scoring and job description generation.
projects.impact: Streamlined hiring for platform engineering roles with AI-assisted tools for recruiters and a dedicated dashboard for candidates to manage applications and profiles.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer, architected the Next.js app, implemented Firebase services, integrated Genkit for AI features, and set up Stripe and Cloudinary.
features: Stripe integration for job posting credits

projects.title: Freemap
projects.purpose: A platform designed to connect users based on location and facilitate real-time communication through video calls, enabling users to create profiles and discover others on a map.
projects.impact: Facilitates community building by combining location-based discovery with real-time video communication for social networking, shared interests, or local services.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer, responsible for designing and implementing the Node.js/Express backend with MongoDB, integrating real-time communication via Socket.io and Jitsi, developing the React frontend with mapping functionalities, and managing user authentication and profile features.

projects.title: Digital Starter
projects.purpose: A web application designed to provide a structured digital learning or onboarding experience, guiding users through various phases with integrated AI assistance and progress tracking.
projects.impact: Streamlines user onboarding and learning by offering a clear, multi-phase journey, enhancing engagement through AI assistance, and enabling personalized progress tracking.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer & Project Architect, designed the user flow, integrated AI assistance, and managed authentication and progress tracking features.
features: Integrated AI Assistant for Help & Support

workExperience.title: IT Support & Python Development (Apprentice)
workExperience.subtitle: HDI France, Paris
workExperience.description:
• Provided Level 1 & 2 technical support, managing user incidents for hardware, network, and software issues via GLPI.
  • Modernized and maintained legacy Python scripts, focusing on performance optimization, bug fixes, and code readability.
  • Developed automation scripts to streamline document exports, improving data accessibility and workflow efficiency.
  • Managed the IT asset lifecycle, including deployment, configuration, and network administration for user workstations and meeting room hardware (ClickShare).
